item.title: Lone Genius Myth
item.description: The false narrative that great work emerges from isolated individuals with superhuman talents.

item.title: Scenius
item.description: An ecology of talent where great ideas emerge from collaborative creative communities.

item.title: Request for Comments (RFC)
item.description: Collaborative decision-making process where proposals are shared for feedback before finalization.
